analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/42/0xaa215b24bb735dadcaaac4e72dc15cae4f362fab.sol:
	Contract Weekycoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/42/0xaa215b24bb735dadcaaac4e72dc15cae4f362fab.sol#441-445)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/42/0xaa215b24bb735dadcaaac4e72dc15cae4f362fab.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/42/0xaa215b24bb735dadcaaac4e72dc15cae4f362fab.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/42/0xaa215b24bb735dadcaaac4e72dc15cae4f362fab.sol#181) is not in mixedCase
